EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultant Services Email 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Juan,
Thanks for the reply. Good luck with everything and please keep us in mind when you go consulting again in the future.
Steve
From: Juan Colina [mailto:jcvcolina@gmail.com] Sent: Sunday, February 05, 2012 2:49 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Juan Colina
Steve: thank you for the follow up. I have taken a full time job and I am no longer considering consulting. Should circumstances change I'll reach back.
Sincerely, Juan Colina (215) 203-4744
On Feb 5, 2012, at 12:40 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Hello Juan,
I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.
We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.
Regards, Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
